text: Ponders End railway station is in the London Borough of Enfield in northeast London at Ponders End, and is in Travelcard Zone 5, on the Tottenham Hale branch of the Lea Valley Lines, 16 km (10 miles) north of London Liverpool Street. The station, and all trains serving it, are operated by Abellio Greater Anglia.
